game.name: Beyond Magic
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: What happens when someone has no magic in a world where everyone has it? Play this quirky, colorful 16-bit style RPG and find out!
game.shortDescriptionEn: What happens when someone has no magic in a world where everyone has it? Play this quirky, colorful 16-bit style RPG and find out!
